definition: front/forward/ahead/first/top (followed by a number)/future/ago/before/BC (e.g. 前293年)/former/formerly
"fire" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 86), occurring in 熙, 然, 熊 etc
jianbing, a savory Chinese crêpe/pancake/CL:張|张[zhang1]
to dry and roast over a low fire (tea, chestnuts, seaweed etc)/to torrefy

sentences.english: Holiday makers travelling in Shanghai must taste raw-fried steam bread.
sentences.chinese: 生煎饅頭是遊客在上海旅行必嘗的食品。

sentences.english: Jianchaling gold deposit is closed related to the Jianchaling ultrabasic rock mass.
sentences.chinese: 煎茶嶺金礦與煎茶嶺超基性岩體有密切的成因聯繫。

sentences.english: Jianchaling gold deposit is closed related to the Jianchaling ultrabasic rock mass.
sentences.chinese: 煎茶嶺金礦與煎茶嶺超基性岩體有密切的成因聯繫。
大明蝦｜盤煎，香蒜，百里香，檸檬。

sentences.english: Heat oil. Add Chng Kee's Sambal Belacan Chilli Paste and stir-fry until fragrant.
sentences.chinese: 用熱油翻炒莊記參芭芭拉煎辣椒醬至香味溢出。

sentences.english: Frank, how about some bacon with your French toast ?
sentences.chinese: 弗蘭克，弄點兒鹹肉就着煎麪包片兒喫好不好？

sentences.english: These ones were very similar to Xiao Lung Bao in that there was a delicious soup inside.
sentences.chinese: 跟小籠包一樣，生煎包裏也包裹着香濃又美味的湯。

sentences.english: So there I was happily pan frying the slabs when I lost my grip on one as I was turning it.
sentences.chinese: 我高興地用煎鍋煎魚片，在翻轉魚片時我失手了。

sentences.english: Add the onions and garlic and saute for about 10 minutes.
Dragonfly: I hear that the new guy can fry flying chickens.
sentences.chinese: 我聽說那個新來的會煎雞排。

sentences.english: The next day, she spooned some of the bacon grease into a pan and fried eggs in it.
sentences.chinese: 第二天，她用勺子拿一些燻肉油脂放到鍋裏來煎雞蛋。

sentences.english: Then the witch placed her cauldron on the fire, to prepare the magic draught.
sentences.chinese: 巫婆於是就把藥罐準備好，來煎這服富有魔力的藥了。

sentences.english: She just learned how to make a scrambled egg. She tried to make it for them.
sentences.chinese: 地剛剛學會煎雞蛋，決定試着爲朋友們做一做。

sentences.english: I don't like milk, I want sausage and pan-fried bacon.
sentences.chinese: 我不喜歡牛奶，我想喫香腸和煎培根。

sentences.english: Fry the steak for five minutes and then turn it and fry the other side.
sentences.chinese: 把牛排煎五分鐘，然後翻過來再煎另一面。

definition: to cook in a covered vessel/to casserole/to stew
to evaporate/(of cooking) to steam/torch made from hemp stalks or bamboo (old)/finely chopped firewood (old)
